Package hospital.undo_redo

Class Action

java.lang.Object
hospital.undo_redo.Action
Direct Known Subclasses:
BookAppointmentAction, DeleteAppointmentAction
public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
Represents an undoable/redoable action took in the system.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.lang.String actionName
    The name which represents this action.
    protected UndoRedoExecutor executor
    The object which can undo and redo the action.
    protected java.lang.reflect.Method redo
    The method to call on the executor for redo.
    protected java.lang.Object[] redoArgs
    The arguments needed for the redo method.
    protected java.lang.reflect.Method undo
    The method to call on the executor for undo.
    protected java.lang.Object[] undoArgs
    The arguments needed for the undo method.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Action​(java.lang.String actionName, UndoRedoExecutor executor, java.lang.reflect.Method undo, java.lang.Object[] undoArgs, java.lang.reflect.Method redo, java.lang.Object[] redoArgs)
    Default constructor of the class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getActionName()
    Getter of the name which represents this action.
    java.lang.Object redo()
    Do or redo the action, based on if it was undone or not before
    java.lang.Object undo()
    Undo the action which executed before.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • actionName

      protected final java.lang.String actionName
      The name which represents this action.

    • executor

      protected final UndoRedoExecutor executor
      The object which can undo and redo the action.

    • undo

      protected final java.lang.reflect.Method undo
      The method to call on the executor for undo.

    • undoArgs

      protected final java.lang.Object[] undoArgs
      The arguments needed for the undo method.

    • redo

      protected final java.lang.reflect.Method redo
      The method to call on the executor for redo.

    • redoArgs

      protected final java.lang.Object[] redoArgs
      The arguments needed for the redo method.

  • Constructor Details

    • Action

      public Action​(java.lang.String actionName, UndoRedoExecutor executor, java.lang.reflect.Method undo, java.lang.Object[] undoArgs, java.lang.reflect.Method redo, java.lang.Object[] redoArgs)
      Default constructor of the class. Creates and undoable/redoable action in the system.
      Parameters:
      actionName - The name of the action.
      executor - The object which can undo and redo the action.
      undo - The method to call on the executor for undo. It has to be public.
      undoArgs - The arguments needed for the undo method.
      redo - The method to call on the executor for redo. It has to be public.
      redoArgs - The arguments needed for the redo method.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the executor doesn't have a method like the undo with the undoArgs as possible parameters or if the executor doesn't have a method like the redo with the redoArgs as possible parameters.

  • Method Details

    • undo

      public java.lang.Object undo() throws UndoNotPossibleException
      Undo the action which executed before.
      Returns:
      The object returned from the undo method.
      Throws:
      UndoNotPossibleException - If some error occurs during executing the undo method.

    • redo

      public java.lang.Object redo() throws RedoNotPossibleException
      Do or redo the action, based on if it was undone or not before
      Returns:
      The object returned by the redo method.
      Throws:
      RedoNotPossibleException - If some error occurs during executing the redo method.

    • getActionName

      public java.lang.String getActionName()
      Getter of the name which represents this action.
      Returns:
      the name which represents this action.
